text: Hello! I have to use PyCall to generate a dataset in a Pluto notebook, but it looks like whenever the cell with the py"""....""" command gets rerun memory usage increases, until eventually I run out of memory. Is this normal? I can't figure it out.

elements.text: Hello! I have to use PyCall to generate a dataset in a Pluto notebook, but it looks like whenever the cell with the py"""....""" command gets rerun memory usage increases, until eventually I run out of memory. Is this normal? I can't figure it out.

text: I found out that as far as you do everything through pyimport and don't use py strings everything works fine
